Articles.Content:
"Main body must be created from Pocket I-Beams and at least 1 1x1m metal plate."

Does that mean that wheels and all main parts have to be connected to that or I can place that anywhere as I can see from images.

This is a really good question, I hope we don't have any some-and-some going on at the moment.
From my understanding, as long as those 2 components are included, anything goes.

Testing new proto machine and everything is going well for now it is a very fast car, still learning track.

1:40 not bad for the early design and not knowing the track. Still possible to improve a lot.

Very frustrated with the bug in the last sector in front of hangar it is exactly on the best line and always flip my car, if using different line then I lose some time for corner. for the next time try to create track that will avoid bugs.

Edited November 21, 2014 by RussaX

Very frustrated with the bug in the last sector in front of hangar it is exactly on the best line and always flip my car

heh, i know EXACTLY what you mean. ive had some killer designs only to be foiled by that one spot

Hey guys, I was just wondering if submissions were still being accepted. Thanks.

From ~No-Company-Name~

Submissions are still open.

By the '1x1 plate and I-Beam' rule, you need at least one of each for the base structure, then build from that with anything.

Also, about the bug: if there weren't little pop-ups now and then, it wouldn't be challenging. That's the point of a challenge

Edited November 22, 2014 by Kyrian
Sounds like a bad excuse imo . ANYWAY is there any chance of getting race 2 soon?

Submissions are still open.

By the '1x1 plate and I-Beam' rule, you need at least one of each for the base structure, then build from that with anything.

Also, about the bug: if there weren't little pop-ups now and then, it wouldn't be challenging. That's the point of a challenge

AHHH, that stupid terrain collider, yeah, it's annoying. I hit it at around 30 m/s and do a 4-5 meter hop with one or both sides of the car before getting all the wheels back on the ground.
Race Two will open on the 25th. 14 days after Race One.

Race Two will open on the 25th. 14 days after Race One.

Ah ok I didn't know that the time in-between races.

Submissions are still open.

By the '1x1 plate and I-Beam' rule, you need at least one of each for the base structure, then build from that with anything.

Also, about the bug: if there weren't little pop-ups now and then, it wouldn't be challenging. That's the point of a challenge

good to know exactly the rules. yeah it wouldn't be challenging when you miss 10 laps in a row with the invisible bug.

By the '1x1 plate and I-Beam' rule, you need at least one of each for the base structure, then build from that with anything.

Hmm, that makes the DP-02 invalid (no I-beams). In which case, I'll build a new car tonight or tomorrow.

Submissions are still open.

By the '1x1 plate and I-Beam' rule, you need at least one of each for the base structure, then build from that with anything.

Also, about the bug: if there weren't little pop-ups now and then, it wouldn't be challenging. That's the point of a challenge

I just thought that I could MASSIVELY reduce the weight on my car

-------------------EDIT----------------------

Removed 2 of the I beams and it weighs 933kg empty! Funny thing was it was under that limit so I had to put radiothermalscopic things on there to keep the weight above 900kg.

Got a 1:25 with infinate RCS fuel just now too!

Edited November 23, 2014 by burnoutforzai
Nice job! Very competitive time

I just thought that I could MASSIVELY reduce the weight on my car

-------------------EDIT----------------------

Removed 2 of the I beams and it weighs 933kg empty! Funny thing was it was under that limit so I had to put radiothermalscopic things on there to keep the weight above 900kg.

Got a 1:25 with infinate RCS fuel just now too!

infinite fuel is available?

infinite fuel is available?

NO. It was a test run

Remember, the 'Fastest Lap' category can be entered by the new 'Open Class' which is unrestricted stock cars.

The lap itself doesn't mean anything, apart from bragging rights.

Also to note, all penalties are one second. If you jump start, +1s. If you cut a corner, +1s.

Well if cut a corner is a +1 penalty I think I should be able to do under 1 min lap

Well if cut a corner is a +1 penalty I think I should be able to do under 1 min lap

There is reason tho. If you were to cut the whole lap it would be invalid is my idea...

There's a really odd bug that I've gotten. When I modded in the old small control surface the elevon 4, when I place it, get's replaced by the old one at launch. It's REALLY weird and I was wondering if you guys could help?

Just managed a 1:24! Crazy to see how 5RCS being taken off the weight can reduce your time just enough!

Drawing on the record for this lap with Kyrian!

TRK download: http://www./download/ds0w09par6vxrt4/KRF_-_Formular_K_-_SHA_MKV_LIGHT.trk

Also I'm very sorry for all the 'spam' as you can see above xD.

Edited November 23, 2014 by burnoutforzai

impressive lap time. I am not sure if I will be short with time to post my lap time. I have 1 more day right?

Edited November 23, 2014 by RussaX
so for the open class does it mean no aero orno rcs or does it follow some of the formula k series?
Open class is anything goes, but the rules that are there you must follow. You can have 100 wings and 20 RCS ports, it's open for a reason.

I hope that I am not late

start at 3:00 and finish at 4:28

lap time = 1:28

made over 50 attempts to record lap but finnaly did it.

driving through corners and steering is the key of speed and acceleration.

Idk what is the rank list but seems like a strong lap time. I did not had enough time to develop car I started too late. I had another idea for another design but it was too late to start working with another design.

Used 2x Pocket I-Beams.
